An enhanced task list for VS 2010, designed to make it easier to manage a backlog of features.

HomeWiki:
Project Description
 
An enhanced task list for VS 2010, designed to make it easier to manage a backlog of features.

Written in C# and WPF. Released under the Apache 2.0 licence.

Each item has a simple priority and a status (unstarted, working, testing, completed or deferred). Right-click an item's icon to change priority or status, or double-click the icon to advance to the next status.

The backlog items are stored in a text file with your solution, allowing them to be easily shared through version control and without interfering with systems that don't have the Simple Backlog extension installed.

Visible items can be filtered to allow you to concentrate on the work that needs to be done.
